definition: naengmyeon (Korean dish based on cold noodles in soup)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: For many people, her dry humor is an acquired taste.
sentences.chinese: 很多人是慢慢才喜欢上她的冷面幽默的。

sentences.english: Some people find it harder to catch a deadpan humor, which makes it more charming.
sentences.chinese: 一些人认为冷面笑话更难理解，这让它更具魅力。

sentences.english: Korean Cold Noodles are gradually gaining popularity among common Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜冷面正在慢慢地赢得中国百姓的喜爱。

definition: as cold as ice and frost (idiom, usually of woman); icy manner/frigid
knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
oden, Japanese dish made with boiled eggs, processed fish cakes, daikon radish, tofu etc in a kelp-based broth
iron mask (as defensive armor)/fig. upright and selfless person
